tit.e: The former head office of the Kyoto Prefectural government
The former head office of the Kyoto Prefectural government
The former head office of the Kyoto Prefectural government

sen.j: 京都府庁旧本館（きょうとふちょうきゅうほんかん）は、京都府京都市上京区にあるルネサンス様式の建築物。
sen.e: The former head office of the Kyoto Prefectural government is a Renaissance style buiding located in Kamigyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
The former head office of the Kyoto Prefectural government is a Renaissance style buiding located in Kamigyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
The former head office of the Kyoto Prefectural government is a Renaissance style building located in Kamigyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
It is a national important cultural property.
It is a national important cultural property.
It is a national important cultural property.

sen.j: 京都府の技師を務めた松室重光の設計により、1904年（明治37年）竣工。
sen.e: The construction of the office designed by Shigemitsu MATSUMURO, who was an engineeri in the Kyoto Prefecural government, was completed in 1904.
The construction of the office designed by Shigemitsu MATSUMURO, who was an engineeri in the Kyoto Prefecural government, was completed in 1904.
The construction of the office designed by Shigemitsu MATSUMURO, who was an engineer in the Kyoto Prefectural government, was completed in 1904.

sen.j: かつては京都府庁庁舎本館として使用された。
sen.e: In the past, it was used as the head office of the Kyoto Prefectural government.
In the past, it was used as the head office of the Kyoto Prefectural government.
In the past, it was used as the head office of the Kyoto Prefectural government.

sen.j: 所在地（本館）：京都市上京区下立売通新町通西入薮ノ内町
sen.e: The location (of the head office): Shimodachiuridori-Shinmachidorinishiiri-yabunouchi (下立売通新町通西入薮ノ内町), Kamigyo Ward, Kyoto City
The location (of the head office): Shimodachiuridori-Shinmachidorinishiiri-yabunouchi (下立売通新町通西入薮ノ内町), Kamigyo Ward, Kyoto City
The location (of the head office): Yabunouchi-cho, Shinmachi-dori Nishi-iru, Shimotachiuri-dori, Kamigyo Ward, Kyoto City

sen.j: 最寄駅：京都市営地下鉄京都市営地下鉄烏丸線丸太町駅より徒歩
sen.e: The station nearest to this building: Get off at Marutamachi Station on the Karasuma Line of Kyoto City Subway and walk.
The station nearest to this building: Get off at Marutamachi Station on the Karasuma Line of Kyoto City Subway and walk.
The station nearest to this building: Get off at Marutamachi Station on the Karasuma Line of Kyoto City Subway and walk.

sen.j: 最寄バス停：京都市営バス府庁前バス停留所
sen.e: The bus stop nearest to this building: the Fucho-mae bus stop for Kyoto City buses (located in front of the prefectural government office)
The bus stop nearest to this building: Fucho-mae bus stop for Kyoto City buses (located in front of the prefectural government office)
